name: Script-Ware Software
description: multi-purpose scripting IDE used to debug lua scripts.
details: A [landing page](https://script-ware.com) and [dashboard](https://dashboard.script-ware.com) complete with a script catalogue, purchase integration, account management and profiles for the multi-purpose scripting IDE.

name: UNC
details: A [website](https://scriptunc.org) for the new, progressive and purposefully vanilla unified scripting API.

name: NexusPIPE
details: A [landing page](https://nexuspipe.com) and [dashboard](https://dash.nexuspipe.com) for the ADC & DDoS mitigation Company NexusPIPE

name: Cryptic
details: Fully automated [website](https://cryptic.rip) to resell and distribute license keys for various products complete with an admin panel for statistics and payouts.

name: Fluxus
details: A simple [landing page](https://fluxteam.net) and [marketplace](https://fluxteam.net/marketplace/) for the scripting IDE.

name: JackBailey API
details: An [API](https://api.jackbailey.uk) to return projects, provide functionality to the contact form and return steam games for my [gaming website](https://glymps.xyz).

name: CS Stretch
details: A script to adjust your desktop's resolution while running CSGO - allowing for windowed fullscreen in non-native resolutions.

name: GTA Suspend
details: A simple winform app to suspend + resume an app - Used for GTA "Solo Public" Lobbies
